concept.title: Step 3: Create keystores
concept.shortdesc: The GemFire server requires keys and keystores in the Java Key Store (JKS) format while the native client requires them in the clear PEM format. Because of this, you need to be able to generate private/public keypairs in either format and convert between the two.

conbody.p: There are public third party free tools and source code available to download such as from http://yellowcat1.free.fr/keytool_iui.html.
